Name: OpenSSL Remote Code Execution
Description: An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.
Solution: Update OpenSSL to version 3.1.5 or later.

Name: TLS Certificate Validation Bypass
Synopsis: TLS certificate validation can be bypassed
Description: The remote host accepts self-signed certificates in some configurations.
Solution: Update TLS library and enforce strict certificate validation.

Name: SSH Protocol Version Detection
Synopsis: SSH server supports older protocol versions
Description: The SSH server allows connections using protocol version 1.99.

Name: Web Server Information Disclosure
Description: The web server includes version information in HTTP response headers.
Solution: Configure the web server to suppress version information.

Name: MySQL Information Schema Access
Description: Non-privileged users can access the information_schema database.
Solution: Review database user permissions and restrict access.

Name: TLS Certificate Information
Description: This is an informational finding about the TLS certificate.
